scenario: A suspicious Pwershell script in a .txt file was found on one of our endpoints, can you work out what it does?
questions: What is the SHA256 hash value for the PowerShell script file?
What email address is used to send and receive emails? (Format: Mailbox@domain.tld)
What is the password for this email account?
What port is used for SMTP? (Format: Port Number)
What DLL is imported to help record keystrokes? (Format: filename.extension)
What directory is the generated txt file put in? (Format: directory name)
